== Introduction ==

This page describes setting up the <nowiki>[[Evolution]]</nowiki> Mail Client to access your email from your Hotmail (Windows Live) account.  

=== Create A Hotmail Account In Evolution ===
This will set up Evolution to access your Hotmail account.  If this is your first account to be set up, a wizard will open when you first start Evolution.  Otherwise you will have to add an account by using the following Evolution menu item
'''''Edit>Preferences>Mail Accounts>Add'''''

=== Receiving(POP) Mail ===

* Server Type: '''POP'''
* Server: '''pop3.live.com (Port 995)'''
* Username: '''`johndoe@hotmail.com`'''
* Use Secure Connection: '''SSL encryption'''
* Authentication: '''Password Authentication'''

=== Sending(smtp) Mail ===

* Server: '''smtp.live.com (Port 25 or 587)'''
** Note: Some ISPs block port 25, if you are having a problem sending mail, substitute '''smtp.live.com:587''' for the server information above.
* Server requires authentication: '''Checked'''
* Security: '''TLS encryption'''
* Authentication: '''Plain''' or '''Login'''
* Username: '''`johndoe@hotmail.com`'''
